physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Drowsy neurological status with equal and reactive pupils bilaterally; no external injury or deformity noted.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Neurological status rapidly deteriorated, necessitating endotracheal intubation and ventilatory support.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Mild right upper-extremity paresis observed, which gradually improved with physical therapy.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Improvement in right upper-extremity paresis noted over time following physical therapy.
